title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Linear Motion Graph Learning Module – Simulation-Based ASSU

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively describe the velocity-time relationship of an object by analyzing linear motion graphs.
Using simulation tools, learners can perform prediction-observation-explanation cycles for virtually designed motion scenarios.
Learners can connect real physical phenomena with graphical representations with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
